tool_description:
Diffbot extracts data from web pages automatically and returns structured JSON. For example, our Article API returns an article's title, author, date and full-text. Use the web as your database!

We use computer vision, machine learning and natural language processing to add structure to just about any web page.
name: Diffbot
title: Diffbot

api_list.name: Article API
api_list.description: The Article API is used to extract clean article text from news articles, blog posts, and other text-heavy web pages.

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Specify a value in milliseconds (e.g., &timeout=15000) to override the default API timeout of 5000ms.

optional_parameters.name: paging
optional_parameters.description: Send paging=false to disable automatic concatenation of multi-page articles.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Send in a list of comma-separated fieldnames to override default field output in the response.

api_list.name: Frontpage
api_list.description: The Frontpage API takes in a multifaceted “homepage” and returns individual page elements.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Frontpage URL from which to extract items

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Specify a value in milliseconds (e.g., &timeout=15000) to override the default API timeout of 5000ms.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Format the response output in xml (default) or json

optional_parameters.name: all
optional_parameters.description: Returns all content from page, including navigation and similar links that the Diffbot visual processing engine considers less important / non-core.

api_list.name: Product API
api_list.description: The Product API retrieves full product data from any e-commerce shopping page.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL of the page to process.

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Specify a value in milliseconds (e.g., &timeout=15000) to override the default API timeout of 5000ms.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Send in a list of comma-separated fieldnames to override default field output in the response.
